global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed to the Station Papa Array 2019-09-30T01:40:00 UTC and recovered 2020-06-07T03:09:16 UTC. On 2020-04-21 the glider was commanded to depart the Papa Array and fly toward Oregon to maximize recovery options as the 2020 Station Papa cruise was postponed due to COVID-related concerns. Science sensors continued to sample on the swim to Oregon until 2020-05-29 when they were disabled to preserve battery power for recovery. Conductivity measurements are out of range and suspect from 2019-11-21 through 2019-11-27. We believe that the CTD was fouled during this period but cannot know for sure.
global_attributes.OOI_platform_type: OOI Global Station Papa 1000m Open Ocean Glider

platform.long_name: OOI Global Station Papa 1000m Open Ocean Slocum Glider gp_537
